Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device designed to help people communicate over long distances.
The student can depict the use of sound in the design of the string telephone.
The student can show both students using the string telephone to send and receive information.
The student can identify and use only the materials provided for building the string telephone.
The student can represent specific expected features like the ability to send and receive messages.
The student can describe how the string telephone helps people communicate with each other.
